seo.title: Entra ID: 1-Hour Briefing
seo.description: Tackle IAM challenges with expert advice to boost security, streamline access, and improve compliance with Entra ID.

blocks.heading: Entra ID: 1-Hour Briefing
blocks.body: Address identity and access management challenges and receive expert advice on how to enhance security, streamline access, and improve compliance using Entra ID.

accordionItems.label: Business Process Analysis
accordionItems.content: We examine your existing processes and workflows to identify opportunities for automation and optimization using Power Platform.

accordionItems.label: Blueprint Creation
accordionItems.content: We create a comprehensive blueprint for your Power Platform solution, detailing the architecture, required components, and Azure integration points.

accordionItems.label: Licensing and Product Recommendations
accordionItems.content: We offer guidance on the most cost-effective licensing options and best practices for governing your Power Platform environment.

accordionItems.label: Product Backlog Items with Effort/Time Estimates
accordionItems.content: We provide a feature list with effort estimates, allowing for accurate planning and budgeting, while accounting for potential timeframe changes based on project scope.

accordionItems.label: Implementation Roadmap
accordionItems.content: We design an in-depth plan that outlines the steps necessary for successful Power Platform adoption, considering your business objectives and timelines.

buttons.buttonText: Rules to Best Practices for Entre ID

blocks.heading: Trusted in Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, and Newcastle by
The SSW Specification Review: Your Blueprint for Software Success
blocks.body: You wouldn't build a house without an architect's plan, so don't build software without a specification. We define the roadmap, mitigate risks, and provide accurate estimates before a single line of code is written.

cards.heading: The Specification Review
cards.description: Understanding a complex system takes more than one meeting. We spend time gathering stakeholder requirements to create a detailed project roadmap, ensuring we understand the destination before we start the journey.

cards.heading: Requirements Analysis
cards.description: We break down the technical landscape to define your architectural roadmap, integration plans, and deployment strategy. By identifying the MVP and potential risks early, we prevent costly bottlenecks later.

cards.heading: Product Backlog
cards.description: We translate your requirements into a tangible list of Product Backlog Items (PBIs). This includes setting priorities, mapping dependencies, and estimating the effort required to build the solution step-by-step.

cards.heading: Ballpark Estimates
cards.description: Budget clarity is essential. We provide realistic projections on the number of sprints, the size of the development team, and the estimated total cost, giving you the data you need to secure approval.

cards.heading: From Wireframes to Product
cards.description: Deep engagement ensures we solve the right problem. We move from rough wireframes to detailed UX designs and final development, keeping you in the loop until the "Definition of Done" is met.

blocks.heading: Speak to SSW about your next **Power platform** project

features.heading: Microsoft Power BI
features.description: Guide decision making with stunning reports and real-time insights from across your organization.

features.heading: Microsoft Power Apps
features.description: Build and launch professional-grade apps and automate workflows without additional coding.

features.heading: Microsoft Power Automate
features.description: Boost productivity by automating repetitive tasks and workflows with process automation.

features.heading: Microsoft Power Pages
features.description: Create websites and customer solutions fast while securely storing and managing data.

features.heading: Microsoft Copilot Studio
features.description: Transform customer and employee experiences when you build custom copilots.
